description.en: SickBeard is a PVR for newsgroup users (with limited torrent support). It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows and when they are posted it downloads them, sorts and renames them...
description.fr: SickBeard is a PVR for newsgroup users (with limited torrent support). It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows and when they are posted it downloads them, sorts and renames them...

ask.en: Choose host for app, if you keep default 127.0.0.1, app will be installed on Yunohost during the process
Enter the fork's git URL (Used only for localhost installation) :
Choose the listening port of the app (not used if it's a local installation)
